text: Swimming at the 1st Asian Indoor Games was held 13 to 17 November 2005 at the SAT Swimming Pool, Huamark Sports Complex in Bangkok, Thailand. The competition featured 40 short course (25m) events: 20 for males, 20 for females. ==Medalists== ===Men=== {| |- |50 m freestyle | || 22.63 | || 23.07 | || 23.22 |- |100 m freestyle | || 49.91 | ||
